bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Wilson D. Coyle. Certificates of Bill of Costs
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: I hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing bill of costs, and that the same amounting to the sum of $10.95 is just and correct. S.C. Hyde Prosecuting Attorney for Spokane County.

I certify that I have examined the foregoing Bill of Costs, amounting to the sum of $10.95 and the same appearing to me to be just and correct, is hereby approved and allowed. George Turner Associate Justice Supreme Court Washington Territory and Judge Fourth Judicial District
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss.

I, D.A. Clement Clerk of the District Court of the Territory of Wash ington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, do hereby certify that the above and foregoing is a true and correct transcript of the costs in the above entitled cause, as the same now appears on record in my office.
In testimony whereof I have hereunto set my hand and affixed the seal of said Court, this 23 day of Nov. A.D. 1885. D.A. Clement Clerk By Deputy
In the District Court of Washington Territory. Fourth Judicial Dis- trict.
The Territory of Washington vs. Willis D. Coyle
